Header: Several State Ministers assumed& North Central Governor assume office
Content: Several State Ministers assumed office today. State Minister for Youth Affairs Duminda Dissanayake assumed duties at the Ministry located at the World Trade Centre. Several Ministers and Parliamentarians joined in the occasion. State Minister for Human Rights and Legal Reforms Mohan P. de Silva took over his duties amidst the blessings of the Maha Sangha. Several Ministers and Parliamentarians joined in the occasion. New Governor of the North Central Province Prof. Tissa Vitharana has assumed duties in his post. Prof. Tissa Vitharana assumed office amidst religious observances after a Police Guard of Honour.
